report.title: Thanks Doc
report.author: Old Dirty
report.bodytext: Taking 4 15 mg capsules will make me stupified for about 3 hours until I stay asleep. /n /n I originally was prescribed these to get off percocet from an ATV accident. I told the doctor I couldn't sleep after he cut me off the pain meds so he gave me a script for 20 of the 15 mg tablets. I didn't fill it at first until I heard that Temazepam is a benzo drug and I find it to be nice. /n /n It is also a great way to sleep through the sweaty withdrawal from opiods.
